titles: Father Malebranche his treatise concerning the search after truth The whole work complete. To which is added the author's Treatise of nature and grace: being a consequence of the principles contained in the search. Together with his answer to the animadversions upon the first volume: his defence against the accusations of Monsieur De la Ville, &c. relating to the same subject. All translated by T. Taylor, M.A. late of Magdalen College in Oxford.
author: Malebranche, Nicolas, 1638-1715.
Taylor, Thomas, 1669 or 70-1735.
Malebranche, Nicolas, 1638-1715. Traité de la nature et de la grace. English.
publisher: Printed by W. Bowyer, for Thomas Bennet at the Half-Moon, and T. Leigh and W. Midwinter at the Rose and Crown, in St. Paul's Church-yard,
notes: A translation, by Thomas Taylor, of: Malebranche, Nicolas.  Recherche de la vérité.
Another "second" edition has "D. Midwinter" in imprint.
"A treatise concerning nature and grace" has divisional title page, and separate pagination and register.
Reproduction of the original at the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Le Valois, Louis, 1639-1700 --  Early works to 1800.
Knowledge, Theory of --  Early works to 1800.
